content.prompt:
The x axis ranges from 0 to 9 in increments of 1. The y axis is labeled Residuals and ranges from negative 4.5 to 4.5 in increments of 0.5. The 8 plotted points have the following approximate coordinates:

  • (1 comma negative 3.1)
  • (2 comma 1.5)
  • (3 comma 4)
  • (4 comma 2.4)
  • (5 comma negative 2.3)
  • (6 comma negative 4)
  • (7 comma negative 1.8)
  • (8 comma 3.3)

​

​Students in a science class are constructing a model for a data set. The residual plot for their quadratic regression model is given. Which of the following is the best conclusion?

choices.label: ​The quadratic model is appropriate because the residuals show a pattern.
​The quadratic model is appropriate because the residuals show no pattern.
​The quadratic model is not appropriate because the residuals show a pattern.
​The quadratic model is not appropriate because the residuals show no pattern.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Support conclusions or choices with a logical rationale or appropriate data.
